channel.title: Alert and Yell
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I just downloaded the TorvaPkz v2 or v3, Idk. But I got a question about the Alert, News, and the Yell.
Does anyone how to edit the notification if you login? There pop-ups a Alert, but Idk how to edit it. Can someone please tell / explain me where to?
And my second question about the [Newss] Where can I change the text?
And my last question, where can I edit the Yell? Like the colours, and the text. Like [Awesome Owner] Owner Jessee, incase of [Owner] Owner Jessee
Thanks for everyone that helps me, or atleast try's it :) Btw, I chose this Source to learn coding ;)

item.title: Alert and Yell
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

Okay, thanks man.
I’ll see if it works

Read full topic

item.title: Alert and Yell
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

1 and 2, Client.java. Just use Ctrl+f for keywords to find what you are looking for
3, Commands.java. Ctrl+f for yell and the <col=______> is the color. Just google html color codes and put the color you want.

Read full topic
